website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, flavorful, and fortified with a scientifically formulated mineral blend, Zilla managed to cram a wide variety of delicious and healthy foods into this pellet formula that tortoises naturally enjoy.
pros: Corn, oats, wheat, alfalfa meal, wheat middlings, and fish meal are the first 6 ingredients
Ingredients mimic the varied diet of a wild tortoise
cons: Some picky tortoises may not eat this pellet formula unless it has been moistened first

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have two Russian tortoises. Every morning I add a few pellets on their dish of greens. Prior to adding the pellets, my torts were sluggish about eating. Now they are eating all of their food every day. The pellets have a bit of a fruity smell that I believe attracts them to the dish.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Aronds

customer_reviews.title: My Sulcata tortoises love this food
customer_reviews.text: My Sulcata tortoises love this food. While small, it's the easiest thing for them to eat. Once they get larger, they still love it, but they can each much larger pellets than this.
customer_reviews.author: Myownshadow13

customer_reviews.title: I always soak the food in water for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this product for about a year. At first our box turtle didn’t care for it so I combined it with the Wardly Reptile Sticks which I had always given her. She now eats them with no problem. I still combine the two and she seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: PokerCarol

customer_reviews.title: Tortoise approved!
customer_reviews.text: Our desert tortoise seems to really like this brand and has for a long time. Good pricing too!
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Our Russian tort. Loves these smaller pellets and our local pet store does not always have.
customer_reviews.author: ChristiGriff

customer_reviews.title: Value Added
customer_reviews.text: We have had my turtle for 10 tears. This is a trusted brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My tortoise likes this ! Great value in this 3pack
customer_reviews.author: M & D

customer_reviews.title: Tortoises will love it.
customer_reviews.text: Our tortoise Jeffrey loves it. She doesn't eat any other foods we have bought previously.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My tortoises love the food and it's half the price of the pet store. Recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey L.

customer_reviews.title: So far she isn't very crazy about this. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: So far she isn't very crazy about this. It's seems to be the only food she leaves in her dish.
customer_reviews.author: GOK

customer_reviews.title: Tortoise gives it a good review by enthusiastic mastication
customer_reviews.text: my Hermann's tortoise loves this food and munches it in the dry form a great supplement to fresh vegetable material. just make sure to keep water available.
customer_reviews.author: Steve the Elder

customer_reviews.title: Preferred food for Steve-O.
customer_reviews.text: This is my red foot tortoises favorite food. No matter his other options he prefers the crunchy!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Wines

customer_reviews.title: Not much to say, but my Red Foot Tortoise loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, but my Red Foot Tortoise loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Redfooted tortoise
customer_reviews.text: My tortoise loves it. 2 years old. Mixed daily with 🥬
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: box turtles love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter brought me this because her box turtles loved it. My turtles love it also. I've tried not less than 15 types of dried food and this is their favorite. They still like the homemade stuff I make on my days off better. It's definitely easy. Best premade food I tried so far. Unfortunately petsmart doesn't carry it. thank goodness for amazon.
customer_reviews.author: nonya

product_meta.title: (3 Pack) Zilla Land Turtle And Tortoise Fortified Food, 6.5-Ounce Containers
product_meta.description: Value Pack of 3! Turtle owners prize an active pet with varied, vivid shell color. Zilla food is formulated to deliver both, plus the life-lengthening mineral blend owners canâ€TMt recreate with table scraps or do-it-yourself pet nutrition. 40+ individual ingredients are combined to match the diet of flowers, berries, plants and insects land turtles enjoy in the wild. For extra appeal, we gave each nugget a flower shape. Itâ€TMs all in one easy-to-use screw top jar, safely blended for year-round daily feeding. Just one look at the eye catching label makes it easy to find the right food.
feature_bullets: 3 - 6.5-ounce jars Land Turtle and Tortoise food
Fortified turtle food promotes excellent shell color and activity
Can be mixed with vegetables and fruits or be fed as your turtle's primary diet
Provide food at all times to simulate natural foraging behavior, discard moist and soiled food daily
Land turtles and tortoises are primarily herbivores that consume plants, berries, flowers as well as some insects in the wild, and this food is formulated with ingredients they need
